channel.title: Gauntlet Community Open Gaming: Countdown!
channel.description:
Our GCOG weekend's coming up 4/16-4/19. We have about 40 games running, and some seats remain open. It's free-- if you're moving to online ttrrpg play, this is a great chance to try things out. If you're a veteran, we have a great line up of games.
For more info see here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-community-open-gaming.html To check out the events: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info Our handbook for the event: https://sites.google.com/view/gcog
Here's my Twitter thread on sessions with seats from today: https://twitter.com/GauntletRPG/status/1249726683919405063
We have a new Discord we're using for managing this and future events: https://discord.gg/MvCqYca Feel free to join.

item.title: Gauntlet Community Open Gaming: Countdown!
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

Our GCOG weekend’s coming up 4/16-4/19. We have about 40 games running, and some seats remain open. It’s free-- if you’re moving to online ttrrpg play, this is a great chance to try things out. If you’re a veteran, we have a great line up of games.

For more info see here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-community-open-gaming.html
To check out the events: https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info
Our handbook for the event: https://sites.google.com/view/gcog

Here’s my Twitter thread on sessions with seats from today:

twitter.com

The Gauntlet (GauntletRPG)

This coming Thursday is day one of our Gauntlet Community Open Gaming weekend. It's free & has just shy of 40 events. You can find more details here: gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-commu… You can see our handbook for the event here: sites.google.com/view/gcog Let's look at games with open seats! https://t.co/Skugzh0aFR
3:50 PM - 13 Apr 2020 1

We have a new Discord we’re using for managing this and future events: https://discord.gg/MvCqYca
Feel free to join.
